languages.text: Простор все больше погружался во мрак, отдаваясь во власть врагов Человечества. Но даже в самой глубокой тьме может жить частичка света. По всему сектору верующим стала являться во снах беловолосая дева с серебряной звездой в руке и обугленным осколком аквилы на поясе. Она вдохновляла смелых вставать на борьбу с силами Архиврага, а тех, кто был немощен, болен, истязаем в плену, — утешала и укрепляла дух перед лицом страдания.

The Expanse was falling ever further into darkness, surrendering to the power of the enemies of Humanity. But even in the deepest shadow, a spark can be found. A white-haired maiden carrying a silver star and with a charred shard of an Aquila at her waist began to enter the dreams of the faithful across the sector. She inspired the bold to rise up against the forces of the Archenemy. And for the frail, the sick, and those tormented in captivity, she offered solace and words of strength to embolden them in the face of suffering.
languages.original_text: Простор все больше погружался во мрак, отдаваясь во власть врагов Человечества. Но даже в самой глубокой тьме может жить частичка света. По всему сектору верующим стала являться во снах беловолосая дева с серебряной звездой в руке и обугленным осколком аквилы на поясе. Она вдохновляла смелых вставать на борьбу с силами Архиврага, а тех, кто был немощен, болен, истязаем в плену, — утешала и укрепляла дух перед лицом страдания.

traits.locale_text: The Expanse was falling into the darkness, giving itself into the power of the enemies of Humanity. But even in the deepest shadow, a spark can be found. A white-haired maiden with a silver star in hand and a charred shard of an Aquila on the waist began to enter the dreams of the faithful. She inspired the bold to rise up to fight the forces of the Archenemy. And for the frail, sick, or tortured in captivity, she offered solace and words of strength to embolden them before the face of suffering.

She inspired the bold to rise up to fight the forces of the Archenemy. And for the frail, sick, or tortured in captivity, she offered solace and words of strength to embolden them before the face of suffering.

The Expanse was falling ever further into darkness, surrendering to the power of the enemies of Humanity. But even in the deepest shadow, a spark can be found. A white-haired maiden carrying a silver star and with a charred shard of an Aquila at her waist began to enter the dreams of the faithful across the sector. She inspired the bold to rise up against the forces of the Archenemy. And for the frail, the sick, and those tormented in captivity, she offered solace and words of strength to embolden them in the face of suffering.

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区进一步堕入黑暗，受制于人类之敌的力量。但即便是最深邃的阴影中，也能发现火花。一位白发少女开始出现在扩区忠诚信徒的梦境之中，她手持银星，腰间挂着烧焦的双头鹰碎片，鼓励勇敢的人们奋起反抗混沌大敌。她还会安慰那些体弱多病的人，抚慰那些饱受折磨的囚犯，用充满力量的话语激励他们直面苦难。
languages.original_text: The Expanse was falling ever further into darkness, surrendering to the power of the enemies of Humanity. But even in the deepest shadow, a spark can be found. A white-haired maiden carrying a silver star and with a charred shard of an Aquila at her waist began to enter the dreams of the faithful across the sector. She inspired the bold to rise up against the forces of the Archenemy. And for the frail, the sick, and those tormented in captivity, she offered solace and words of strength to embolden them in the face of suffering.

traits.locale_text: 科罗努斯扩区逐步堕入黑暗，投靠人类之敌的力量。但即便是最深邃的阴影中，也能发现火花。一位白发少女开始出现在扩区忠诚信徒的梦境之中，她手持银星，腰间挂着烧焦的双头鹰碎片，鼓励勇敢的人们奋起反抗混沌大敌。她还会安慰那些体弱多病的人，抚慰那些饱受折磨的囚犯，用充满力量的话语激励他们直面苦难。

languages.text: Die Ausdehnung fiel noch weiter in die Dunkelheit und ergab sich der Macht der Feinde der Menschheit. Doch selbst im tiefsten Schatten ist ein Funke zu finden. Eine weißhaarige Maid mit einem silbernen Stern und dem versengten Splitter eines Aquila an der Hüfte begann den Gläubigen im Sektor im Traum zu erscheinen. Sie inspirierte die Mutigen, sich gegen die Mächte des Erzfeinds zu erheben. Und den Schwachen, Kranken und gepeinigten Gefangenen bot sie Trost und Worte der Kraft, um sie im Angesicht ihres Leids zu stärken.
languages.original_text: The Expanse was falling ever further into darkness, surrendering to the power of the enemies of Humanity. But even in the deepest shadow, a spark can be found. A white-haired maiden carrying a silver star and with a charred shard of an Aquila at her waist began to enter the dreams of the faithful across the sector. She inspired the bold to rise up against the forces of the Archenemy. And for the frail, the sick, and those tormented in captivity, she offered solace and words of strength to embolden them in the face of suffering.

traits.locale_text: Die Ausdehnung fiel in die Dunkelheit und ergab sich der Macht der Feinde der Menschheit. Doch selbst im tiefsten Schatten ist ein Funke zu finden. Eine weißhaarige Maid mit einem silbernen Stern und dem versengten Splitter eines Aquila an der Hüfte begann den Gläubigen im Sektor im Traum zu erscheinen. Sie inspirierte die Mutigen, sich gegen die Mächte des Erzfeinds zu erheben. Und den Schwachen, Kranken oder in Gefangenschaft Gefolterten bot sie Trost und Worte der Kraft, um sie im Angesicht ihres Leids zu stärken.

languages.text: Incapables de résister à la puissance des ennemis de l'humanité, les Étendues sombraient dans les ténèbres. Cependant, une étincelle peut briller même dans l'obscurité la plus profonde. Une jeune femme aux cheveux blancs, une étoile d'argent à la main et un fragment brûlé d'Aquila à la ceinture, se mit à visiter les rêves des fidèles du secteur. Elle inspirait aux plus audacieux de se soulever contre les forces du Grand Ennemi et offrait force et réconfort aux faibles, aux malades et aux captifs pour les encourager à tenir bon dans l'adversité.
languages.original_text: The Expanse was falling ever further into darkness, surrendering to the power of the enemies of Humanity. But even in the deepest shadow, a spark can be found. A white-haired maiden carrying a silver star and with a charred shard of an Aquila at her waist began to enter the dreams of the faithful across the sector. She inspired the bold to rise up against the forces of the Archenemy. And for the frail, the sick, and those tormented in captivity, she offered solace and words of strength to embolden them in the face of suffering.

traits.locale_text: Incapables de résister à la puissance des ennemis de l'humanité, les Étendues sombraient dans les ténèbres. Cependant, une étincelle peut briller même dans l'obscurité la plus profonde. Une jeune femme aux cheveux blancs, une étoile d'argent dans la main et un fragment brûlé d'Aquila à la ceinture, se mit à visiter les rêves des fidèles du secteur. Elle inspirait aux plus audacieux de se soulever contre les forces du Grand Ennemi et offrait force et réconfort aux faibles, aux malades et aux captifs pour les encourager à tenir bon dans l’adversité.

languages.text: La Extensión se estaba sumiendo aún más en la oscuridad, entregándose al poder de los enemigos de la Humanidad, pero incluso en la sombra más negra es posible encontrar una chispa. Una doncella de cabello blanco con una estrella de plata y el fragmento chamuscado de un Aquila en la cintura comenzó a aparecerse en los sueños de los fieles de todo el sector. Inspiró a los valientes a alzarse contra las fuerzas del Archienemigo, y a los débiles, enfermos y atormentados en su cautiverio les ofrecía consuelo y palabras firmes para ayudarles a resistir frente al sufrimiento.
languages.original_text: The Expanse was falling ever further into darkness, surrendering to the power of the enemies of Humanity. But even in the deepest shadow, a spark can be found. A white-haired maiden carrying a silver star and with a charred shard of an Aquila at her waist began to enter the dreams of the faithful across the sector. She inspired the bold to rise up against the forces of the Archenemy. And for the frail, the sick, and those tormented in captivity, she offered solace and words of strength to embolden them in the face of suffering.

traits.locale_text: La Extensión se estaba sumiendo en la oscuridad, entregándose al poder de los enemigos de la Humanidad, pero incluso en la sombra más negra es posible encontrar una chispa. Una doncella de cabello blanco con una estrella de plata y el fragmento chamuscado de un Aquila en la cintura comenzó a aparecerse en los sueños de los fieles de todo el sector. Inspiró a los valientes a alzarse contra las fuerzas del Archienemigo, y a los débiles, enfermos o apresados les ofrecía consuelo y palabras firmes para ayudarles a resistir frente al sufrimiento.

languages.text: エクスパンスは人類の敵の力に屈し、さらなる闇へと落ちた。しかし、深い影の中にも輝きを見出すことはできる。銀の星を持ち、腰には焼け焦げたアクィラの破片をつけた白髪の乙女が、この星域中に生きる信心深い人々の夢の中に入り込み始めたのだ。彼女は渾沌の勢力に立ち向かう勇敢な人々を鼓舞した。そして、虚弱な者、病める者、囚われの身となり拷問を受ける者に対しては慰めを与え、苦しみに直面している彼らを勇気づけるための力強い言葉をかけつづけた。
languages.original_text: The Expanse was falling ever further into darkness, surrendering to the power of the enemies of Humanity. But even in the deepest shadow, a spark can be found. A white-haired maiden carrying a silver star and with a charred shard of an Aquila at her waist began to enter the dreams of the faithful across the sector. She inspired the bold to rise up against the forces of the Archenemy. And for the frail, the sick, and those tormented in captivity, she offered solace and words of strength to embolden them in the face of suffering.

traits.locale_text: エクスパンスは人類の敵の力に屈し、さらなる闇へと落ちた。しかし、深い影の中にも輝きを見出すことはできる。銀の星を持ち、腰には焼け焦げたアクィラの破片をつけた白髪の乙女が、この星域中に生きる信心深い人々の夢の中に入り込み始めたのだ。彼女は渾沌の勢力に立ち向かう勇敢な人々を鼓舞した。そして、虚弱な者、病める者、囚われの身となり拷問を受ける者に対しては慰めを与え、苦しみに直面している彼らを勇気づけるための力強い言葉をかけつづけた。

languages.text: Enginlik giderek daha fazla karanlığa gömülüyor, İnsanlığın düşmanlarının gücüne teslim oluyordu. Ancak en karanlık gölgede bile kıvılcım çakabilirdi. Tüm sektördeki inananlar, rüyalarında gümüş bir yıldız taşıyan, belinde alazlanmış bir Çift Başlı Kartal parçası olan, beyaz saçlı bir kadın görmeye başladı. Kadın, cesurlara ilham olup Şerbaşı'na başkaldırmalarını sağladı. Kırılgan, hasta ve tutsaklık eziyeti çekenlere ise teselli sundu, çektikleri acılar karşısında onları yüreklendirdi.
languages.original_text: The Expanse was falling ever further into darkness, surrendering to the power of the enemies of Humanity. But even in the deepest shadow, a spark can be found. A white-haired maiden carrying a silver star and with a charred shard of an Aquila at her waist began to enter the dreams of the faithful across the sector. She inspired the bold to rise up against the forces of the Archenemy. And for the frail, the sick, and those tormented in captivity, she offered solace and words of strength to embolden them in the face of suffering.

traits.locale_text: Enginlik giderek daha fazla karanlığa gömülüyor, İnsanlığın düşmanlarının gücüne teslim oluyordu. Ancak en karanlık gölgenin içinde bile bir kıvılcım bulunabilir. Tüm sektördeki inanan insanlar rüyalarında, gümüş bir yıldız taşıyan, belinde alazlanmış bir Çift Başlı Kartal parçası olan, beyaz saçlı bir kadın görmeye başlamıştı. Cesur kişilere ilham verdi ve Şerbaşı'na başkaldırmalarını sağladı. Kırılgan, hasta ve tutsaklık eziyeti çekenlere ise teselli sundu, çektikleri acılar karşısında onları yüreklendirdi.
